name: City of San Franicsco - Department of Digital Equity
description: The Department of Digital Equity was established to develop and maintain programs that provide full and equitable access to digital technology and its benefits so all San Francisco residents and communities can thrive, regardless of demographics.
fullDescription: The Department of Digital Equity was established to develop and maintain programs that provide full and equitable access to digital technology and its benefits so all San Francisco residents and communities can thrive, regardless of demographics.
whatTheyOffer: The Department of Digital Equity was established to develop and maintain programs that provide full and equitable access to digital technology and its benefits so all San Francisco residents and communities can thrive, regardless of demographics.
address: 1 South Van Ness, San Francisco, CA, 94103
